page.title: 14Lawshall's Clubs & Sports
page.content: Lawshall villagers make use of the village hall for many social & sporting clubs.There is the Derby & Joan Club for senior citizens, meeting weekly. The Playgroup & Mother & Toddler club on weekdays.Two table tennis teams play -ing once each week through the league season-Sept to April.Brownies meet weekly there.The Drama club rehearse and perform their annual winter panto- mime.The Horticultural Society hold their annual flower show there.The Womens Institute meet monthly(they also have a table tennis team).The Village Hall Committee hold their monthly meet- ings there and are always putting on fund raising events,on the calendar at present are a Tramps Supper,Sponsored Walk and a Barn Dance.The Youth Club meet once a week, with fortnightly Disco's.
